Page Profile Discussions: This widget forms the Discussions tab on the Page Profile and displays the discussions of the Page. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Page Profile.
Circle Profile Discussions: This widget forms the Discussions tab on the Circle Profile and displays the discussions of the Circle. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Circle Profile.
Most Discussed Circles

Page Profile Discussions: Displays list of Pages having maximum number of discussions.
Circle Profile Discussions: Displays list of Circles having maximum number of discussions.

Page Profile Discussions: Forms the Discussions tab of your Page. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Page Profile.
Circle Profile Discussions: Forms the Discussions tab of your Circle. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Circle Profile.
